roleset.name: to put on a fast track
roleset.note: FASTTRACK-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT-P01-Task 03. Framed by Claire. (from fasttrack.01-v)

example.name: All args
example.text: [The USN]-1 is also attempting *PRO*-1 to fast-track its Seabasing platforms which theoretically would make up for the draw-down in legacy amphibious warfare platforms.
